original_title: Lesbian Adventures: Older Women Younger Girls 3
overview: In this latest installment of the popular series, older women and younger girls resolve their differences through passionate lovemaking, casting all conflict aside as they bring each other to explosive, quivering orgasms. Lesbian couple Dana Vespoli and Nicki Hunter are fed up with their young tenant, Chastity Lynn. After Dana leaves for work, Nicky has words with Chastity, quickly schooling the young girl in how to behave. Meanwhile, Dana, a plumber by trade, meets young Remy LaCroix. As Dana fixes her leaky faucet, the flirtatious Remy seduces her. Obnoxious, older actress Amber Michaels butts heads with young assistant Maddy O'Reilly, who gives the older stunner a reality check, and finally Magdalene St. Michaels confronts her fiance's bratty young daughter Mia Gold, who gives her future stepmother more than the older woman bargained for! Written & Directed by Dana Vespoli.
title: Lesbian Adventures: Older Women Younger Girls 3
